sentences.en: barbarian invasions of the fifth century
sentences.cn: 五世纪时野蛮人的入侵

sentences.en: Barbarian King: This time, Ghost of Sparta, I will have your head!
sentences.cn: 蛮族首领: 这一次, 斯巴达的鬼魂, 轮到我取你的首级了!

sentences.en: Barbarian King: This time, Ghost Sparta, I will have your head!
sentences.cn: 蛮族首领: 这一次, 斯巴达之魂, 我将取下你的首级.

sentences.en: It is good to see wisdom from an untutored barbarian.
sentences.cn: 真是非常高兴看到无知的野蛮人终于也展现出一点点的智慧了.

sentences.en: Mr Murdoch is a barbarian at the gates indeed.
sentences.cn: 默多克先生确实是站立门外的野蛮人.

sentences.en: The Barbarian King laughs with a tone vengeance in his voice.
sentences.cn: 蛮族首领的笑声透露出他强烈的复仇欲望.

sentences.en: The city endured centuries of chaos caused by waves of barbarian invasions.
sentences.cn: 米兰城经历了几个世纪被野蛮人入侵的混乱.

sentences.en: The rest of the clan thinks the uniform is only fit for a barbarian or a man of the lowest class.
sentences.cn: 家族里的其他人员认为,这样的制服只适合野蛮人或最低贱的人穿.

sentences.en: The Sanctuary of Apollo at Delphi is attacked by the barbarian Romaioi!
sentences.cn: 德尔菲的阿波罗圣所受到了野蛮的罗马人的袭击!

sentences.en: The walled city was attacked by barbarian hordes.
sentences.cn: 那座有城墙的城市遭到野蛮部落的袭击.

sentences.en: To some extent, a barbarian has also many merits.
sentences.cn: 其实野蛮人没什么不好,反倒是有很多优点.

sentences.en: Toughens the Barbarian's skin, increasing armor by X %.
sentences.cn: 使野蛮人的皮肤变硬, 增加X%护甲.

sentences.en: Unlike a barbarian , however, a rage drake is not fatigued after raging.
sentences.cn: 和野蛮人不同, 狂暴龙兽在狂暴之后不会力竭.

sentences.en: We need to fight this barbarian attitude to science.
sentences.cn: 我们需要与这种对待科学的野蛮态度作斗争。

sentences.en: You should watch your table manners; you eat like a barbarian.
sentences.cn: 你应该好好注意你的餐桌礼仪; 你吃饭跟野蛮人一样.

trans.tran_cn: 野蛮人，原始人，异邦人，粗野的人，无教养的人
trans.tran_en: someone from a different tribe or land, who people believe to be wild and not  civilized
